original_text: While all this was happening, Peter was still knocking at the door. Then someone went and opened the door. They were all very surprised when they saw him there.
korean_text: 베드로가 문 두드리기를 그치지 아니하니 그들이 문을 열어 베드로를 보고 놀라는지라

sentences.original_text: Peter was still knocking at the door
Then someone went and opened the door

sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그곳에 있는 것을 보았을 때
